tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plant_watering_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id UUID NOT NULL,
    schedule_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    water_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    moisture_threshold FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PlantSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    watering_time TIMESTAMP,
    watering_duration INTERVAL,
    soil_moisture_threshold FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Plant (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(50),
    plant_type VARCHAR(50),
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_watered TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    plant_id INT,
    moisture_level FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE plant_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    watering_day VARCHAR(20),
    watering_time TIME,
    duration_minutes INT
);
